sentence.Network_en: The variety of garnet includes almandine, pyrope, magnesium - iron garnet, manganese aluminum garnet, andradite and calcium - chromium garnet.

sentence.Network_en: Besides sapphire, zircon and almandine are produced in Minxi, Fujian, which form gem mineral association.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from obsolete French, alteration of alabandine, from medieval Latin alabandina (gemma), 'jewel from Alabanda', an ancient city in Asia Minor where these stones were cut

means.word_mean: 1. a purple variety of the ruby spinel
2. a deep red garnet consisting of iron aluminum silicate
